mapper.insert: insert into bsh_book(bookName, authorId, publeYear, publisher, cateCode, bookPrice, bookStock, bookDiscount, bookIntro, bookContents) values(#{bookName},#{authorId}, #{publeYear},#{publisher},#{cateCode},#{bookPrice},#{bookStock},#{bookDiscount},#{bookIntro},#{bookContents})
mapper.select: select * from bsh_bcate order by cateCode
